_comment: M.A.S.S. Trap Audio Clip Definitions â€” Police Dispatcher Voice
_format: Each clip has: filename (what ESP32 expects), script (what the dispatcher says), category (firmware/lab/extra), notes
_voice_instruction: Speak as a calm authoritative police radio dispatcher with clipped cadence and clear enunciation, professional and slightly tense, like calling out a pursuit over the radio, short pauses between phrases, no filler words
_tts_notes: Scripts are written TTS-friendly: minimal punctuation, no exclamation marks, commas only where natural breath pauses occur, no periods between short phrases that cause robotic stops

clips.script: All units, track is armed, standing by for vehicle detection
clips.notes: Plays on START GATE when system arms via LiDAR auto-arm or dashboard ARM button

clips.script: Vehicle detected, race is live
clips.notes: Plays on START GATE when IR beam breaks. Keep SHORT, race is already in progress

clips.script: Suspect vehicle has crossed the finish line, time recorded
clips.notes: Plays on FINISH GATE when car crosses finish sensor

clips.script: New record, updating the Most Wanted list
clips.notes: Plays on FINISH GATE when a new best time is set. Not yet wired in firmware code

clips.script: All clear, track resetting to standby
clips.notes: Plays when race state resets to IDLE after cooldown. Optional firmware addition

clips.script: Clock sync complete, all stations aligned
clips.notes: Could play when clock sync drift is corrected. Low priority

clips.script: Signal lost, check connections and retry
clips.notes: General error sound, could play on ESP-NOW peer timeout

clips.script: Speed trap triggered, velocity recorded
clips.notes: Plays on SPEEDTRAP device when dual-IR sensors capture velocity

clips.script: Attention all units
clips.notes: General attention getter, used as prefix before condition changes in the lab manager

clips.script: Load next vehicle onto the track, standing by for deployment
clips.notes: Lab manager between runs when the car changes, Ben needs to swap cars

clips.script: Attention, test conditions are changing, adjust vehicle weight as instructed
clips.notes: Lab manager weight condition changes, Ben needs to add or remove tungsten weights

clips.script: Trial complete, evidence logged, prepare for next run
clips.notes: Lab manager after each successful run in the testing loop

clips.script: All trials complete, lab is now secured, outstanding work units
clips.notes: Lab manager all tests finished, the victory moment

clips.script: Anomalous reading detected, review data before proceeding
clips.notes: Lab manager sanity check triggered for suspicious timing or speed values

clips.script: New case number assigned, evidence chain initiated
clips.notes: Lab manager Phase 3 when case numbers are assigned to test matrix

clips.script: New entry on the Most Wanted board
clips.notes: When a new car makes it to the leaderboard

clips.script: M A S S Trap online, all systems nominal
clips.notes: Boot sound after WiFi connects and ESP-NOW initializes. Spelled out M A S S so TTS reads each letter

clips.script: New brother detected on the network
clips.notes: When a new ESP-NOW peer auto-discovers

clips.script: Calibration mode active, deploy reference sphere
clips.notes: Lab manager calibration template, tells Ben to use the steel ball bearing

clips.script: Evidence photo required, document current setup
clips.notes: Lab manager Phase 3 prompts for setup photos before testing begins
